00081 /// youBot joint for the base and the manipulator.
00082 /// Every motor, encoder, transmition combination of the youBot base or manipulator is a YouBotJoint
00083 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

00251 
00252     /// Returns the status messages as status flags for the motor controller. The status flag bits are assigned like this:
00253     /// 0:  Overcurrent
00254     /// 1:  Undervoltage
00255     /// 2:  Overvoltage
00256     /// 3:  Overtemperature
00257     /// 4:  Motor halted
00258     /// 5:  Hall error flag
00259     /// 6:  ---
00260     /// 7:  ---
00261     /// 8:  PWM mode active
00262     /// 9:  Velocity mode active
00263     /// 10: Position mode active
00264     /// 11: Torque mode active
00265     /// 12: ---
00266     /// 13: ---
00267     /// 14: Position end flag
00268     /// 15: Module initialized
00269     /// 16: EtherCAT timeout flag
00270     /// 17: I2t exceeded flag
00271     virtual void getStatus(unsigned int& statusFlags);
00272
